It can also be enabled in a world file by changing the `<view_controller>` tag from `orbit` to `fps` (the following was taken from 
[test/worlds/transparency.world](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/6b22d2744e0c2f3a77e19b6ed8e9ef9b6b677fd0/test/worlds/transparency.world?at=default#cl-78)):
~~~
<gui fullscreen='0'>
  <camera name='user_camera'>
    <pose>5.0 -10.0 1.5  0.0 0.0 1.57079</pose>
    <view_controller>fps</view_controller>
  </camera>
</gui>
~~~
Speaking of which, perhaps we can add an example world that uses the fps view controller?
